20-031CA.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the minutes of the Joint Meeting of the Environmental Committee and Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, July 23, 2020.A motion was made by Vice Chair Wheeler, seconded by Commissioner Skye, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Coby Skye, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbsent: 3 - Hilda Gaytan, Eric Rock and Alan Tolkoff2.

20-032CA.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Coalition for Clean Air on their Recommended Priorities for Oil Tax Revenue Allocation and forward these recommendations to City Council.Commissioner Gaytan joined the meeting.Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Commissioner Gaytan spoke.Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Gaytan and Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air.Commissioner Novak spoke.Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Novak and Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air.Chair Coffee spoke.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air, spoke.Page 2 of 7HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE411 W OCEAN. BLVD, LONG BEACH, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, AUGUST 27, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESChair Coffee spoke.Commissioner Gonzalez spoke.Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air, spoke.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergeron-Birge and Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air.Commissioner Tolkoff spoke.Commissioner Skye spoke.Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Skye and Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air.Commissioner Skye spoke.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.Commissioner Gaytan spoke.Christopher Chavez, Coalition for Clean Air, spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.Commissioner Skye spoke.Commissioner Gaytan spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.Commissioner Skye spoke.Page 3 of 7HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE411 W OCEAN. BLVD, LONG BEACH, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, AUGUST 27, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Skye, seconded by Commissioner Gaytan, to approve recommendation, as amended, to [1] forward Sustainable City Commission recommendations to City Council; and [2] request Sustainability Staff to consider participation in the Clean Air Day this year.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Alan Tolkoff, Coby Skye, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbsent: 1 - Eric Rock3.
